body:
Fancy, yet undeserved.

you say your tournament process needs some work. I beg to differ, I think it needs A LOT of work. 

Our team got third place in this tournament without winning a single match. We played two matches and lost them both, but managed to cling on. A team in the semi-finals was dq-ed for cheating, I think there were more no-shows than actual matches played.

Until these problems are addressed, people will not take this network seriously and until you do, do not host another tournament. This one was not very enjoyable.

sorry, but it had to be said.
RIP Insidia
RIP Omega Championship
Gratz Berzerk
Bye

title: Hey, look at my fancy new badge

replies.body:
I believe the mistakes in the first tournament was/is a good chance to ensure they don't occur again. As some say, how are we meant to improve if there are no mistakes? We are always looking to improve, and now is the chance for us to do so.

You wanted a tournament, you got one. Sure it may not have been enjoyable for you, but when you actually tell us to stop planning future tournaments it doesn't help the situation at all.

For the sake of the community, I'll release what us Officials plan to do in order to improve ourselves,  future tournaments and whatnot.
